1. If you haven’t slept well. Tell your brain “I slept well”. You will feel refreshed and it works like a charm
2. Want to get rid of hypothetical negative thoughts? Ask them logical questions when they strike you. They will lose their power and gradually their frequency will reduce.
3. Want to feel confident? When meeting someone just assume you have everything, they want from you. It will be enough to seal the deal.
4. Want to relieve stress in an awkward situation? Smile, you will instantly feel light and happy.
5. Want to complete something? Convince your brain to start the work. Once you do you will find it interesting and complete it.
1. Compliment someone and be genuine
2. Donate to charity. Clothes, money, old toys etc.
3. Volunteer for an hour at an organisation of your choice
4. Buy someone a gift – just because.
5. Allow a fellow driver to merge into your lane
6. Write a thank-you note to someone who wouldn’t expect it
7. Plant a tree
8. Think of something you do well and use that talent to benefit others
9. Teach an elderly person to surf the internet, write e-mails etc.
10. Organise a family meal and appreciate being together
